Class BufferAutoRegisteringFactory

IBufferFactory
public class BufferAutoRegisteringFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBufferFactory

Trieda, ktora vytvara buffre a hned ich zaregistruje. Tzv mame pristup k vsetkym buffrom.

Author:
Lukas Sekerak
